name: iOS + iPadOS Safari View Controller
description:
A SFSafariViewController UI kit to help you display your web designs and content in your AppStore apps, whether they are on iPod touch, iPhone, or iPad!


Everything was made to match the latest versions of SFSafariViewController as close as possible so you can focus designing instead of worrying about the container frames.


Features

✅ 3 or 4 Action Toolbar Options

✅ Presentation Modes:

  • fullScreen (iOS + iPadOS)
  • pageSheet (iPadOS)
  • formSheet (iOS + iPadOS)
  • note: pageSheet and formSheet presentation modes look and behave the same way on iOS, but will give you differently sized windows on iPadOS. I've included descriptions from Apple developer documentation to help explain the differences.

✅ Autolayout Support

✅ Fully Responsive Constraints

✅ Component Variants with Dark Mode options


Is there something I missed?

Feel free to leave feedback in the comments or find me on Twitter (@makeitfancy or link in profile)


Font Requirements

Icons are all from SF Symbols 2.1. If you don't have SF Symbols, or if you have outdated SF fonts, the icons will not display properly.

Be sure to download the latest SF Pro fonts and SF Symbols directly from Apple's design resources.
